text:
*[Bug 18846] S4 method defined on class union not found for object of union subclass derived in another package*
<https://bugs.r-project.org/show_bug.cgi?id=18846>

Axel Klenk (<mailto:axel.klenk@gmail.com|axel.klenk@gmail.com>) changed:

           What    |Removed                     |Added
----------------------------------------------------------------------------
             Status|UNCONFIRMED                 |CLOSED
         Resolution|---                         |Works as documented

--- Comment #3 from Axel Klenk (<mailto:axel.klenk@gmail.com|axel.klenk@gmail.com>) ---
Thanks a lot for looking into this and providing a solution and sorry for being
so slow to respond.  I'll try to make our package work based on your solution
then.
